title: champion concept, the hive mother.
body:
rough idea i came up with. Thoughts and criticisms? plz dun be mean or i will {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}} and commit Sudoku

name

isabella

the hive mother.




passive-one with the hive-hive mothers mark. 

summon a hive every 30 seconds, hives store a maximum of 2.

hives realease 3/4/6 eggs every 5 seconds which can be collected.

the hive mother can have a maximum summon count of 8/13/18.

if the hive is destroyed it will explode dealing 200(.6 ap%) dam.

Hive mind - the hive mother marks enemy targets with auto attacks, that will cause your bugs to attack.


q-larvae

turns a egg into a larvae which spits projectiles at an enemy dealing magic damage and covers them in sticky slime slowing the enemy.

hp 150/200/250/300/400 

dam 10/15/17/20/25(+.5% ap)

slow by 10/15/20/25/35% slow maxes at 3 seconds then drops off, cannot slow the same target within 7 second seconds.

cooldown 3 seconds cost 1 egg.

maximum spawns 5/6/7/8/9


w-chrysalis- turns a larvae into an placable pupa that explodes dealing aoe magic dam and slowing the enemy b x% if they are marked

hp 2/3/4/5/6 hits

dam 60/80/110/150/200 (+.7% AP) in aeo radius

cooldown 7 seconds, cost 1 egg

maximum spawns 3/4/5/6/7


e-adult - summon mantis like creature from a chrysalis who frenzy at enemies dealing dam+magic dam per hit. each hit raises their attack speed by 10%

HP 250/300/350/400/500

DAM 12/16/22/25/35(+.5% AP)

max's at 40% as but will still take buffs from swarm.

+3/5/7/10/15 % lifesteal.

cooldown 12 seconds, cost 2 eggs

maximum spawns 3/4.@rank 3/5.@ rank 5)




r-Violent swarm.

after channeling for .25 seconds the hive mother lets out a screech dealing  150/220/340(+.6 AP) magic dam and marking anyone within x radius and frenzies attackspeed of all summons by 20/40/60% attackspeed and movement speed. for 4/5.5/7 seconds.
